title: 因未带口罩，老头受辱自杀
contents:
上街没戴口罩（买不到），被警察拘留5天，每天罚抄100边「上街必须戴口罩」，获释后老头自杀。

https://twitter.com/Lihua__CHEN/status/1226943442569322496：Because he can't buy a mask! He was detained for 5 days, and he transcribed 100 times a day, "Must wear a mask when going out." After returning, he committed suicide in Wuhan.


大陆网站说这是谣言，「辟谣」了：

https://www.guancha. cn/politics/2020_02_13_536148.shtml?s=sywglbt

补充一下，他还被罚款五千。
